name: @tvenceslau/ui-decorators-web
description: Extension of decorator validation to ui elements

scripts.minify: npm install gulp gulp-babel gulp-rename gulp-concat gulp-sourcemaps gulp-typescript gulp-uglify @babel/preset-env && npx gulp && npm uninstall gulp gulp-babel gulp-rename gulp-sourcemaps gulp-typescript gulp-uglify gulp-concat
scripts.prepare-release: npm run build:prod && npm run coverage && npm run docs
scripts.coverage: stencil test --coverage --coverageDirectory=./workdocs/coverage --coverageReporters=json-summary --spec --e2e && npm install jest-coverage-badges && jest-coverage-badges --input "./workdocs/coverage/coverage-summary.json" --output "./workdocs/badges" && npm uninstall jest-coverage-badges
scripts.docs: rm -rf ./docs/* && cp -r ./workdocs/assets ./docs/assets && npm install better-docs taffydb && npx markdown-include ./mdCompile.json && npx jsdoc -c jsdocs.json -t ./node_modules/better-docs && cd docs && ./../workdocs/bin/correct_windows_names.sh . && cd .. && npm remove better-docs taffydb

author: Tiago Venceslau
